ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (OT) Squad Ring Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is no direct relationship between the difficulty of a monster and the value of related faction hits.  That being said, it should be noted that Mooto
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:21 AM 5/30/2001 -0400, you wrote:

>Does killing tougher things increase faction more? Like the difference
>between killing a goblin and a goblin shaman, for example? Same faction
>hits and increases, just wondering if it was larger?


There is no direct relationship between the difficulty of a monster and the
value of related faction hits. That being said, it should be noted that
Mooto DOES give a significantly higher faction increase - but this is
intentional - not a function of math ;)

Talies the Wanderer
